duties_responsibilities.duty: Build a book of residual income through business-to-business sales and prioritize opportunities for revenue growth.
Proactively pursue potential clients through face-to-face meetings, networking, and fast portfolio building.
Engage in critical business discussions to solve business owners' problems related to promoting and selling products and services.
Maintain client relationships for future revenue growth and renewal, utilizing compelling communication and persistent follow-up.
Participate in training related to publishing and sales, while maintaining high performance and meeting set standards.
Run with high-performing sales professionals, demonstrate persistence, and control the future with a refusal to lose.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
